Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of tobacco products.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting smoking on and around hospital grounds.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting smoking on and around hospital grounds.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to tighten advertising restrictions in the federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act and to allow localities to legislate in this area, in order to reduce the exposure of youth to tobacco advertising.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to tighten advertising restrictions in the federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass the Family Smoking and Prevention Act.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: United States Congress to pass the Family Smoking and Prevention Act.
